meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2844
agenda_items.description: An application for a new subdistrict on property zoned Tract 1 and Tract 1A within Planned Development District No. 260; and the termination of Specific Use Permit No. 1569 for a medical clinic or ambulatory surgical center and in-patient rehabilitation facility.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2845
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2155 for a recycling buy-back center for the collection of household and industrial metals.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2846
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 1687 for a bar, lounge, or tavern and an inside commercial amusement limited to a Class A dance hall.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2847
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a motor vehicle fueling station and for the sale of alcoholic beverages.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2848
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Planned Development District No. 435.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2850
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for an auto service center.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2851
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No.1501 for a private school.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2852
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for an auto service center and vehicle display.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2853
agenda_items.description: An application for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a general merchandise or food store.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 23-2854
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Planned Development District No. 636.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case 23-2855
agenda_items.description: An application to replat a 3.064-acre tract of land.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case 23-2856
agenda_items.description: An application to create one 3.630-acre lot.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case 23-2857
agenda_items.description: An application to create one 0.223-acre lot.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case 23-2858
agenda_items.description: An application to create 11 lots and one common area.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case 23-2859
agenda_items.description: An application to create one 17.900-acre lot and one 3.042-acre lot.

agenda_items.title: Residential Replat Case 23-2860
agenda_items.description: An application to replat a 0.381-acre tract of land.
